attributes.action: Require photo identification or passport verification for social media accounts.
attributes.additional_details: Online trolling, bullying and harassment has gone way too far. I have noticed a pattern in which perpetrators tend to make fake (burner) accounts to avoid accountability when saying inflammatory, slanderous and upsetting things to people online. It’s sadly common on the internet and can have adverse effects on people since the internet is now our new medium in daily life and communication. Instead of social media being a place where we are happy to be, it is stained by internet trolls.
attributes.background: Require all social media accounts to require a process of id/passport verification and the use of a legal government name.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650995
